The King Fahd Mosque (), also known as King Fahd Bin Abdul Aziz Alsaud Mosque ), is a Sunni mosque, located in the Alipašino polje neighbourhood of Sarajevo, in Bosnia and Herzegovina. It is the largest mosque in Sarajevo and the Balkans. It was established and funded by Saudi Arabia, and is named in honour of Saudi King Fahd.
